item.sql: INSERT INTO map_model_component_load ( mcl_cus_number, mcl_load_id, mcl_mci_id, mcl_load_name, mcl_load_mode, mcl_view_id, mcl_pos_x, mcl_pos_y, mcl_pos_z, mcl_rot_x, mcl_rot_y, mcl_rot_z, mcl_order, mcl_create_uid, mcl_update_uid, mcl_create_datetime, mcl_update_datetime ) VALUES ( :mcl_cus_number, :mcl_load_id, :mcl_mci_id, :mcl_load_name, :mcl_load_mode, :mcl_view_id, :mcl_pos_x, :mcl_pos_y, :mcl_pos_z, :mcl_rot_x, :mcl_rot_y, :mcl_rot_z, :mcl_order, :mcl_create_uid, :mcl_update_uid, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

UPDATE map_model_component_load SET mcl_mci_id=:mcl_mci_id, mcl_load_name=:mcl_load_name, mcl_load_mode=:mcl_load_mode, mcl_view_id=:mcl_view_id, mcl_pos_x=:mcl_pos_x, mcl_pos_y=:mcl_pos_y, mcl_pos_z=:mcl_pos_z, mcl_rot_x=:mcl_rot_x, mcl_rot_y=:mcl_rot_y, mcl_rot_z=:mcl_rot_z, mcl_update_uid=:mcl_update_uid, mcl_update_datetime=SYSDATE WHERE mcl_load_id=:mcl_load_id AND mcl_cus_number=:mcl_cus_number

SELECT mci_id AS id, mci_name AS name, mci_path AS path, mci_file_name1 AS file_name1, mci_file_name2 AS file_name2, mci_class AS class_flag, mci_type AS type_flag, mci_type_def AS type_def FROM map_model_component_info

SELECT TO_CHAR(mcl_load_id) AS id, mcl_load_name AS name, 'all_map' AS pid, 89 AS icon, 'false' AS nocheck, 'false' AS isParent FROM map_model_component_load WHERE mcl_load_mode = 1 AND mcl_cus_number =:cusNumber
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT('v_',vmi_id) AS id, vmi_name AS name, CONCAT('v_',vmi_pid) AS pid, 0 AS icon, 'true' AS nocheck, 'true' AS isParent FROM map_view_menu_info START WITH vmi_cus_number =:cusNumber AND vmi_id IN ( SELECT mcl_view_id FROM map_model_component_load WHERE mcl_cus_number =:cusNumber AND mcl_load_mode =2 GROUP BY mcl_view_id ) CONNECT BY PRIOR vmi_pid = vmi_id
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(mcl_load_id) AS id, mcl_load_name AS name, CONCAT('v_',mcl_view_id) AS pid, 89 AS icon, 'false' AS nocheck, 'false' AS isParent FROM map_model_component_load WHERE mcl_load_mode = 2 AND mcl_cus_number =:cusNumber
